#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
double dp[1000010];
int main()
{
	ll t,n;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		if(n==0)
		cout<<"3"<<endl;
		else if(n==1)
		cout<<"1"<<endl;
		else if(n%4==0)
		cout<<n<<endl;
		else if(n%4==3)
		cout<<(n-1)<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"-1"<<endl;
	}
}
